title: cmd/asm: .o file is remained
body:
### What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

go version devel +30088ac Wed Oct 5 17:00:08 2016 +0000 windows/amd64

### What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?

Windows 10 64bit

### What did you do?

go tools asm broken.s

### What did you expect to see?

error but current directory is clean.

### What did you see instead?

.o file is remained
